# Text Transform

## Usage

For detailed instructions, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class               | Support        |
| ------------------- | -------------- |
| `uppercase`         | âœ… Full Support |
| `lowercase`         | âœ… Full Support |
| `capitalize`        | âœ… Full Support |
| `normal-case`       | ğŸŒ Web only    |
